body:
List YOUR top 5 best buddies in Avicus.


1. TheOpAsian (I know him IRL, he's a really funny person, hard working and tooooo guud at pvp)
2. Jozzy (He has 100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 sweg level, nuff said)
3. Jamesandbradly (Basically just like "TheOpAsian")
4. Kido123456771 (has 100000000000 lel level)
5. The community (Without you guys, and the forums :P I'd just be a random noob in avicus)



So yeah, tell me your best buddies! :D

replies.body:
I have a few certain people who I love more than others
But those people know who they are...
But just like a few of the people who posted, everyone is equal and I love everyone. Even those who hate on me. Because I know I only become a better person due to them.
Thank you haters *insert thumbs up here*
But I want to give a little shoutout to jozz, be nice to him :3
